testcase.classname: validate Login Functionality for swag labs application
testcase.name: check the login functionality for valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page for swag lab................................passed When user credentials enter username & password.............................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then Login should be successful.............................................passed

testcase.classname: validate Login Functionality for swag labs application
testcase.name: check the login functionality for invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page for swag lab................................passed When user enter invalid username & password.................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then Error message should be displayed......................................passed
